original: yeah i feel a little less motivated <sniff> um recently well i can't say recently this was back in january um my wife and a few uh friends were noticing that i was um becoming forgetful and i i couldn't remember things i i didn't see it and um you know when they when everybody brought it to my attention then i started to but anyway i went to the doctor and um they gave me the tests and apparently i have m_c_i which is mild cognitive impairment and uh i've over the last month or so nobody has mentioned it to me i mean maybe i'm getting better but the neurologist that i saw <sss> is having me come back in a year and gonna retest me um hopefully it's not the beginning stages of alzheimer's i'm still a little young for that i'm only fifty <fif> fifty two but um i was diagnosed with uh mild cognitive impairment and uh it it could've been due also i was told by him uh because of the death of my uncle i could've been pretty depressed i was not able to retain things and so well i'm going back in a year and we'll see if uh i'm any better

original: <sigh> uh lately no i don't regret anything lately um <sniff> everything's been fine the like i say the the biggest biggest impact in my life was the event with my uncle and uh i never ever in a hundred years or ever thought that i would face that situation and <sniff> i'll never forget it but they say time heals all wounds and and it does <laughter>
traduit: <sigh> uh dernièrement non je ne regrette rien récemment um <sniff> tout a été bien comme je dis que le plus grand impact de ma vie a été l'événement avec mon oncle et uh je n'ai jamais jamais pensé que je ferais face à cette situation et <sniff> je ne l'oublierai jamais mais ils disent que le temps guérit toutes les blessures et il fait <rire>

original: advice_back (what advice would you give to yourself ten or twenty years ago)
traduit: conseil_back (quel conseil donneriez-vous il y a dix ou vingt ans)

original: don't listen to other people uh again i'm not trying to bring up my uncle just because of what has happened but he used to constantly tell me to uh he would see the things that i was doing and the paths that i was going down and i constantly thought i knew better and i think a lot of youngsters think that anyway they um the young lady that i was talking to in here they think they're invincible and so did i <laughter> i figured ah i'm never gonna i'm never gonna have those problems um i wish i could've changed some things um <coughs> the history of my past follows me as it does everybody and that has limited me in in a lot of opportunities and a lot of things that i'm able to do uh i don't miss them but if i could go back uh ten or twenty years i definitely wouldn't make some of the decisions that i made
traduit: Je n'essaie pas d'évoquer mon oncle juste à cause de ce qui s'est passé, mais il me disait constamment qu'il voyait les choses que je faisais et les chemins que j'allais descendre et je pensais constamment que je savais mieux et je pense que beaucoup de jeunes pensent que de toute façon ils um la jeune dame à laquelle je parlais ici ils pensent qu'ils sont invincibles et ainsi je pensais que je ne vais jamais avoir ces problèmes um j'aurais aimé que j'ai changé certaines choses um <toux> l'histoire de mon passé me suit comme il le fait tout le monde et cela m'a limité dans beaucoup d'opportunités et beaucoup de choses que je suis capable de faire uh je ne les rate pas mais si je pouvais revenir uh dix ou vingt ans je ne ferais certainement pas certaines des décisions que j'ai prises

original: Ellie17Dec2012_08 (what are you most proud of in your life)
traduit: Ellie17Dec2012_08 (de quoi êtes-vous le plus fier dans votre vie)

original: my welding certificates um i'm uh certified by the american welding society and i've uh <sniff> uh that's probably the biggest achievement that i've made for you know myself an accomplishment um <clears throat> uh people that i know say that i'm uh well i haven't been working on cars lately but they said that i have a natural knack for uh restoration and working on vehicles and i don't see it but i've been told that once or twice but i i've kind of i i've kind of started to slip away from that i don't i can't say it's from lack of interest but i just don't feel the motivation no more i wish i had a pocket of money and i'd have somebody else to it that's how i feel <laughter>
traduit: C'est probablement la plus grande réalisation que j'ai faite pour vous moi-même un accomplissement um <claire la gorge> uh les gens que je sais dire que je suis euh bien je n'ai pas travaillé sur des voitures dernièrement mais ils ont dit que j'ai un knack naturel pour euh restauration et travailler sur des véhicules et je ne le vois pas mais on m'a dit qu'une ou deux fois, mais j'ai en quelque sorte commencé à m'éloigner de ça je ne peux pas dire que c'est par manque d'intérêt mais je ne sens plus la motivation que j'aimerais avoir une poche d'argent et que j'aurais quelqu'un d'autre pour lui, c'est comme ça que je me sens <rir>

traduit: demande_tout ( ok, je pense que j'ai demandé tout ce que j'ai besoin de)

traduit: Très bien.
